sentences.en: And under the influence of that wintry piece of fact, she would become torpid again.
sentences.cn: 于是在凛冽如寒风一般的事实的影响之下, 她又回到蛰伏的状态之中.

sentences.en: He was, according to witnesses, extremely wintry with Her Royal Highness.
sentences.cn: 据目击者称，他对女王殿下极其冷淡。

sentences.en: I love crisp wintry days when you wrap up in cosy winter clothes.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢清冽的冬日，可以裹着舒适的冬衣。

sentences.en: In winter, the wintry snow scenes can be likened to an exquisite jade carving.
sentences.cn: 冬日琼装玉琢, 俏丽媚人.

sentences.en: It felt wintry cold that day.
sentences.cn: 那天感觉像冬天一样寒冷。

sentences.en: Sundays were dreary days in that wintry season.
sentences.cn: 在那酷冷严寒的季节,星期天是个悲哀的日子.

sentences.en: The day was cold and dark and wintry and the stone of the houses looked cold.
sentences.cn: 那天天冷,天色又暗,一片冬天景象,连房屋的石头,看起来也是寒冷的.

sentences.en: The fields have frosted over in this wintry morning.
sentences.cn: 在这寒冷的早晨田野里覆盖着一层霜.

sentences.en: The wintry sun was already low in the sky.
sentences.cn: 一轮冬日已经低垂天幕.

sentences.en: Their hungry, wintry cry used to remind the boys of wonderful animal stories.
sentences.cn: 它们那冬天的饥饿的呼唤常使小伙子们回忆起一些稀奇古怪的动物故事.

sentences.en: We went out and up the street. It was cold and wintry.
sentences.cn: 我们出门上了街. 街上又寒冷又冷落.

sentences.en: Wherefore , I say again, have we sought this country of a rugged soil and wintry sky?
sentences.cn: 我再问一遍, 我们为什么来到这个土地不平、气候寒冷的国度?

sentences.en: Wintry weather continues to sweep across Britain.
sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气继续席卷整个英国。

sentences.en: Women in furs and men in greatcoats moved gaily in the wintry air.
sentences.cn: 淑女们披着皮裘,绅士们身着大衣,在这凛冽的严寒中欢天喜地地走来走去.

trans.tran_cn: 冬天的，冬天似的，寒冷的，风雪交加的
